mapper.select: select count(*) from base_contract where publishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select uuid,contarctName,createtime from base_contract where publishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by createtime desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{rows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(*) from base_contract where publishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and contarctName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

select uuid,contarctName,createtime from base_contract where publishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and contarctName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by createtime desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{rows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select uuid,contarctName,createtime from base_contract where publishTime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by createtime desc limit 0,#{toprows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
